name: Brave
description: Hit -15 and base might is reduced by half. @{const:ap:AP +1} if unit initiates combat, otherwise @{const:ap:AP +1} to foe if foe’s @{const:ap:AP = 2}. Consumes 2 TP per attack and decreases Max TP by 5 when placed in unit’s inventory. (Penalty can only be removed using Restore once traded to another Unit.) Disabled on spells and Brawl weapons.
